price: (30) Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time"?[1557]
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ
footnotes: [1557]- i.e., some accident or inevitable death.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shāʿirun natarabbaṣu bihi rayba al-manūni
